name: RHS — City Neutralizer (Hidden)
uniques: [-100]% unhappiness from the number of cities
Automatically built in all cities where it is buildable
Will not be displayed in Civilopedia

name: RHS — Occupation Office (Hidden)
uniques: Removes extra unhappiness from annexed cities
Automatically built in all cities where it is buildable
Can only be built <in annexed cities>
Will not be displayed in Civilopedia
